author: newsr.in
title: Bigg Day 2: Contestants to face their worst phobias today
text: Early to bed, early to rise, makes a man healthy, wealthy and wise. Arvind Vegda is sacrificing his health, and wisdom for the sanity of the other housemates. Realising that his loud snores are disturbing the housemates’ peaceful sleep, he makes the decision of staying up all night to ensure that the rest of the house gets a ... »
